headline: Software Enginner
about:
Result oriented Software Engineer with over 10years of experience in building and maintainingsoftware and web solutions.
Proficient in various programming languages (Ruby,Javascript/Typescript, etc), development tools andweb frameworks (Ruby on Rails, Astro.build/React.js/Node, backbone.js, ember.js ), with a strong background in Agile/Scrum environments.
Experienced in TDD (Rspec, playwright, jest.js,mocha.js, jasmine.js), pair programming, and CI/CDdevops (Git, Github actions, Docker, AWS EC2,ECS). Seeking to leverage technical and strategicskills to drive growth and maintain up-to-dateindustry knowledge in software engineering.

experiences.title: Co Founder
experiences.jobDescription:
The AsiaVR Association is a Singapore-based non-profit association focused on promoting dialogue, debate, collaboration and investment in this rapidly evolving area of technology innovation.

Our members come from a wide variety of disciplines, including user interface and application development through to VR documentary filmmaking and branded content creation.

For more information, please visit www.AsiaVR-association.org

experiences.title: CEO
experiences.jobDescription:
VRcollab is a software start-up that is invested by SGinnovate, Entrepreneur First and HTC VIVE. First incorporated in December 2016, VRcollab‚Äôs mission is to redefine collaboration and design coordination in the Architecture, Engineering and Construction (AEC) Industry. 

VRcollab‚Äôs notable clients include:
Building and Construction Authority (BCA)
Housing and Development Board (HDB)
Sembcorp Architects & Engineers
Surbana Jurong Private Limited
Beca Group Limited
Greatearth Construction
Boustead Singapore Limited
National University of Singapore
and many others... 

VRcollab is also involved in several projects, grants and tenders such as the Changi Airport Terminal 5 together with DP Architects and Automated Rule Scanning Robots for BCA.

This is possible because of VRcollab‚Äôs Core Technology that automatically converts BIM (Building Information Models) for use in Virtual Reality. The conversion is done with accuracy and speed ( approx. 4GB BIM converted in 7 Minutes ). VRcollab‚Äôs Team expertise in software development and computer graphics also enhances the usability for multiple use-cases.

Redefining collaboration in construction, VRcollab takes BIM to the next level, enabling architects, engineers, planners and consultants to communicate seamlessly.

Our software instantly converts BIM models for use in design reviews, building requirement approval and construction coordination. This is further enhanced by automated document generation so professionals can concentrate on the design at hand.

headline: 2x Founder in AI & Saas | Co-Founder BukuWarung (YC S20) | Forbes U30 | IIT Bombay
about:
I'm passionate about helping early stage founders succeed and create meaningful impact for people, planet and animals:

‚Ä¢ Co-Founder @BukuWarung (YC S20), empowering Indonesian MSMEs. Raised $80m, built team of 400, scaled to $x billion in payments
‚Ä¢ Angel Investor & Advisor in 40+ startups
‚Ä¢ Director of Product @Carousell, largest second-hand marketplace in SEA
‚Ä¢ Product Lead @Grab, PM #8 - drove 21x growth
‚Ä¢ Software Engineer @Microsoft, IIT Bombay Computer Science

experiences.title: Co-Founder, President & Board Member
experiences.jobDescription: BukuWarung is revolutionizing the way MSMEs in Indonesia manage their businesses through our technology platform. We've raised $80M from top-tier investors globally, including Peter Thiel's Valar Ventures, Goodwater Capital, Y-Combinator, SoftBank Partners, DST Global Partners, and strategic angel investors from Stripe, PayPal, Plaid, Grab, Gojek, Facebook, Airbnb, and Mastercard. Our vision is to empower 60 million MSMEs in Indonesia.

experiences.title: Director of Product
experiences.jobDescription: Carousell is the largest mobile classifieds platform in SEA backed by Telenor, Naspers, Sequoia Capital, Rakuten Ventures, 500 Startups and EDBI

experiences.title: Product Lead
experiences.jobDescription: As PM #8 at Grab, I led the development of multiple product and engineering teams that delivered key products such as Driver Experience, Driver Acquisition, GrabPay Merchant Payments, and Digital Goods. During my time, played a key role in Grab's hyper-growth, which saw the company scale up to a team of 150 PMs. My contributions were instrumental in Grab's success, including securing several billion-dollar funding rounds, acquiring Uber SE Asia, and transforming into a Super app. I take great pride in my work at Grab, and the impact it had on millions of users across Southeast Asia.

‚Ä¢ Speaker at LMFA'19, "Will Cash Always Be King in Asia e-Commerce?‚Äù

‚Ä¢ Speaker at Tech in Asia'18, Singapore: "Ace-ing Product Management Interviews" 

‚Ä¢ Judge at SoundBoard Asia'17, Singapore: Evaluated 6 startups and selected a winner for seed funding

‚Ä¢ Mentor at Startupbootcamp: Advised a fintech start-up on their growth strategies and localisation for SEA

‚Ä¢ Panelist at Startup Weekend Singapore 2018

‚Ä¢ Writer at medium.com/@chinmaychauhan

updates.postText: BukuWarung, a fintech focused on Indonesia‚Äôs micro, small and medium enterprises (MSMEs), announced today it has raised a $60 million Series A. The oversubscribed round was led by Valar Ventures, marking the firm‚Äôs first investment in Indonesia
updates.subTitle: BukuWarung, a fintech for Indonesian MSMEs, scores $60M Series A led by Valar and Goodwater
updates.title: BukuWarung, a fintech for Indonesian MSMEs, scores $60M Series A led by Valar and Goodwater

updates.postText:
Meet my mom, my single biggest source of inspiration, lifetime advisor, and strongest supporter ‚ù§Ô∏è Whenever I‚Äôm faced with a difficult situation, my mom's struggles, relentless hard work and commitment inspires me üôåüèΩ

For the longest period of time, my family earned <$100 per month, and my mom was contributing to 50% of this income. She ran a small tailoring business from our home while also raising us and running the household. She ran this business for several years to help us meet ends financially. 

Her spirit and hustle in running her small business, and overcoming all odds during the toughest of times is what inspired me to start BukuWarung (YC S20) with the mission to empower millions of small and micro businesses in Indonesia who, like my mom, work daily to meet ends for the future of their families.

#UntukYangTercinta #ForTheLovedOnes #BukuWarung
Forbes Presents the 30 Under 30 Asia Class of 2021: 300 young visionaries boldly redefining ten industries across Asia.
updates.subTitle: Forbes 30 Under 30 Asia 2021
updates.title: Forbes 30 Under 30 Asia 2021

updates.postText: BukuWarung, an Indonesian startup focused on digitizing the country‚Äôs 60 million small businesses, announced today it has raised new funding from Rocketship.vc and an Indonesian retail conglomerate. The amount was undisclosed, but sources say it...
updates.subTitle: BukuWarung, a startup digitizing Indonesia‚Äôs SMEs, raises new funding from Rocketship.vc
updates.title: BukuWarung, a startup digitizing Indonesia‚Äôs SMEs, raises new funding from Rocketship.vc

updates.postText:
Proud to share that we launched digital payments supported by major banks & e-wallets on BukuWarung app. In fact, we‚Äôre the first and only app at present that enables merchants to collect payments from customers & make payments to suppliers. Payments marks an important milestone in our product evolution towards monetisation. 

Ibu Ance is one of our very first merchants and has been using BukuWarung for almost a year. Her business has grown by several times over as she has benefited immensely from using our app due to improved cashflow visibility & efficient credit management. During Covid, it became essential for merchants like Ibu Ance to do contactless payments. There‚Äôs 60M micro-merchants in Indonesia and over 600B of GDP flows through them, mostly in cash. Opportunity to digitise these payments is massive.

We're hiring for key roles in product, design, engineering (android/backend) - come join us in helping Indonesian MSMEs go digital.

Vinnie Lauria Abhinay Peddisetty Adjie Purbojati

volunteerAndAwards.description: Animal Rescue & Investigations, Fundraising, Event Management.

recommendationsReceived.name: Ellery J.
recommendationsReceived.subtitle: Digital Transformation I Technical Program Management I Business Operations I Data and AI Governance I Multicloud Strategy
recommendationsReceived.context: Ellery reported directly to Chinmay
recommendationsReceived.description: I was very fortunate to have had the chance to work with Chinmay for the second time, this time in his capacity as BukuWarung's Co-Founder/President and overall Technology leader. He oversaw the scaling up of both the Product, Design and Engineering teams, bringing top-notch people to lead these teams. He is as I remember him from Grab, a very smart product-oriented technical person. He is thoughtful, equally challenging in his questions to his leaders but also deeply empathetic to all who work with him. He is also decisive, can cut through the noise and provide clear direction.

recommendationsReceived.name: Stuart Thornton
recommendationsReceived.subtitle: Building revenue in tech
recommendationsReceived.context: Stuart worked with Chinmay but they were at different companies
recommendationsReceived.description: Ive worked with Chinmay in a few capacities. Chinmay was an angel investor in hoolah where he clearly demonstrated his strategic and tactical capabilities with a professional due diligence into our business. This tested our knowledge of the business and contributed to our learning. His capabilities with product leadership was also evident as we began to work with him on more tactical opportunities outside of investment. Ive also been honored to try and return the favour as he set on his startup course - not that he has needed it at all. Smart, sharp, dependable I know success is around the corner for his latest venture.

recommendationsReceived.name: Lakshay Kalra
recommendationsReceived.subtitle: Product Leader @Viator /Tripadvisor
recommendationsReceived.context: Lakshay reported directly to Chinmay
recommendationsReceived.description:
Chinmay is responsible for hiring me at Carousell and made sure my onboarding is smooth. During a very short period, we developed a good mentee-mentor relationship

In addition to being a strong mentor who is available 24*7,  he is aggressive in his approach, someone who knows how to get 10x growth in the product, constantly pushes his team members to raise the bar and skillful at thinking big while also paying attention to the details.

recommendationsReceived.name: Vaibhav KANTH
recommendationsReceived.subtitle: Product and Business Head, Fintech (APAC, EU)
recommendationsReceived.context: Vaibhav reported directly to Chinmay
recommendationsReceived.description: ‚Ä®Chinmay has a solid knack when it comes to understanding Product and it‚Äôs intricate nuances. His ability to sense the potential of a product/feature across verticals is what makes him phenomenal in the role of someone leading Product at scale. ‚Ä®Over my interaction and time spent working together, I found him to be metric driven and good at envisaging scope in the best interest of the company. He has a penchant for outdoing expectations and in true essence has a ‚ÄúProduct-First‚Äù mindset. As a manager, Chinmay is supportive and visionary. He pushes his team to strive hard towards moonshot goals but at the same time acts as a safety net when required.

recommendationsReceived.name: Aparna Alla
recommendationsReceived.subtitle: Head of Product at Grab | Ex-Flipkart
recommendationsReceived.context: Aparna worked with Chinmay on the same team
recommendationsReceived.description:
Chinmay belongs to one of those rare breed of PMs who can call a spade a spade even when its the toughest of the stakeholders he is dealing with. This rare quality plus the dedication he puts in to research any subject makes him a brilliant product manager. He doesn't compromise on the quality of features for the users & has been visionary in building capabilities that can be used across multiple projects. I have worked closely with Chinmay in Driver Experience team at Grab. He has been an amazing teammate & guide at Grab. He is my go to person if I want to get quality feedback or inputs on my work. 

It was an amazing learning experience working with him & hope to work with him on more projects in future.

recommendationsReceived.name: Tim Kj√¶r Lange
recommendationsReceived.subtitle: Principal Product Designer @ Grab
recommendationsReceived.context: Tim worked with Chinmay on the same team
recommendationsReceived.description:
I know him Chinmay as a highly professional, never-compromising and personable product manager.

I worked with Chinmay on two critical, user-facing projects at Grab, and I was impressed by his insight into the product development process and his fierce advocacy for the user.

I would recommend Chinmay to anyone who values the qualities above, feel free to reach out to me for a further inquiries.

recommendationsReceived.name: Muqi Li
recommendationsReceived.subtitle: Head of Engineering, Trust, Safety, FinID and GrabDefence
recommendationsReceived.context: Muqi worked with Chinmay on the same team
recommendationsReceived.description:
I worked with Chinmay at Grab Driver authentication project. The project is at large scale, and requires collaborations across 10+ internal teams (backend, mobile, QA, business, legal, design, etc.) and several external vendors. Chinmay demonstrates a strong ability for initial tech research, as well as taking strong ownership, and pushing something forward, and making the overall progress smooth.  One most impressive thing he made was driving the mobile team quickly to build up some demo apps at the very beginning, and it significantly speeded up the overall process to decide some complicated tech choice.

It is a pleasure to work with him, and I would recommend Chinmay as a great PM to make things happen.

recommendationsReceived.name: FengYi Yu
recommendationsReceived.subtitle: Staff UX Researcher | ex-Google, ex-Grab
recommendationsReceived.context: FengYi worked with Chinmay on the same team
recommendationsReceived.description: Chinmay is a very organised person. As a product manager, he is able to take the product as a whole with strategic view, push it forward step by step. Also he is able to lead the core members in the team with the same direction to the goal. It's my pleasure to work with him.

recommendationsReceived.name: Terry Yuen
recommendationsReceived.subtitle: tyuen.com
recommendationsReceived.context: Terry worked with Chinmay on the same team
recommendationsReceived.description: Chinmay is customer centric when comes to product development. His past experience in tech field helps a lot when comes to making technical decision going forward to provide greater customer satisfaction. Chinmay is reliable and role model for bridging the gap between business and tech development team.

recommendationsReceived.name: Joel Yarbrough
recommendationsReceived.subtitle: Hiring payment builders in Cape Town, Lagos, and Dubai
recommendationsReceived.context: Joel managed Chinmay directly
recommendationsReceived.description:
I recruited Chinmay to Grab and worked with him for his first 8 months in the company. He was dropped into a highly complex and political situation, to deliver a mission-critical platform that was overdue. Chinmay immersed himself and his engineering team in a "be the customer" experience, spending tremendous time on-site, coding next to the customer, to deliver the first version of the solution within 7 weeks of joining the company. 

Chinmay is an action-oriented product owner, with a strong rapport with his team and a good eye for detail and complexity. I'd happily recommend him to solve other hard, technical, time-sensitive problems in the future.

recommendationsReceived.name: Ellery J.
recommendationsReceived.subtitle: Digital Transformation I Technical Program Management I Business Operations I Data and AI Governance I Multicloud Strategy
recommendationsReceived.context: Ellery worked with Chinmay but on different teams
recommendationsReceived.description: Chinmay is a tech-savvy Product Manager who gets things done. I have worked with him on Grab's Driver On-Boarding and he has demonstrated a keen understanding of business needs and how Product should be able to respond. He is smart, able to zoom in into the details but can also see the big picture. Despite having strong opinions, he is open to other ideas and can change his approach as needed. I like the way he works under intense pressure to deliver, not giving of a hint of being too stressed or frustration, always keeping a COOL optimistic attitude that infects others.

recommendationsReceived.name: Andy Ng
recommendationsReceived.subtitle: Still better than an AI, for now.
recommendationsReceived.context: Andy worked with Chinmay on the same team
recommendationsReceived.description:
Chinmay is a friendly and fun guy to work with at Grab and has a keen eye and passion for startups and new technologies. These traits make him a wonderfully nice PM to work with, exchange new ideas and talk about the next innovations.

He has been a champion for Driver On-boarding at Grab, often going above and beyond and walked the talk by getting his hands dirty and getting to ground zero -  a rare trait found in PMs nowadays. And his efforts resulted in the rapid and successful launches in the SEA countries with the significant increments in driver supply.

His humility and pleasant disposition makes him a great team player to work with and a great asset to Grab!

recommendations.name: Ellery J.
recommendations.subtitle: Digital Transformation I Technical Program Management I Business Operations I Data and AI Governance I Multicloud Strategy
recommendations.description: This is my second time recommending Ellery here in Linked In. He is a good friend and we worked together at Grab building for drivers and merchants in Indonesia. I remember him as an amazing hustler who gets things done and brings focus & clarity to the team, along with strong detail orientation. He had a great run at Grab as a TPM leader and I'm grateful for his trust in me in accepting my invitation to be Head of TPM at BukuWarung.

headline: Software engineer
about:
My mission is to build high-performing teams with a culture of engineering excellence.
Consistently led teams in every role, whether or not in a position of authority.
Passionate about People, Processes and Practices.

Product-minded and user-focused technical leader successful in a full range of roles in 20+ years of career: developer, tech lead, team lead, architect and engineering manager.
I am a software engineer at heart; I strive to remain a generalist, yet most of my efforts are in the Python world, in the web domain. Most of my practices are Agile.

I support organizations in their efforts to scale technically and organizationally, by combining domain-driven design, evolutionary architecture principles (microservices, context maps, event-driven architecture, loose coupling, Conway‚Äôs Law) and proven practices around CI/CD, observability, and QA.

headline: Senior Software Engineer
about:
üëã Hello! I'm a dedicated Software Engineer with experience building scalable systems and driving impactful engineering solutions.

üíº Professional Experience:
As a Senior Software Engineer at Grab, I:
‚Üí Build robust, scalable payments infrastructure to support high-traffic environments and dynamic business needs
‚Üí Design and implement solutions that enhance performance, reliability, and maintainability
‚Üí Collaborate cross-functionally to deliver impactful features aligned with business objectives

üåü Beyond Work:
I enjoy exploring emerging technologies, contributing to tech communities, and continuously improving my technical skills through side projects.
Currently working on:
‚Üí Built stravify.fun ‚Äî an AI-powered tool that uses LLMs to automatically generate personalized and creative titles for Strava activities
‚Üí Building feedbak.ai ‚Äî a feedback collection platform featuring an AI-driven chat-based interface for gathering user insights in a non-structured and conversational way, enabling creators to analyse feedbacks and extract actionable insights.

ü§ù Let's Connect!
I'm always eager to connect with professionals passionate about engineering excellence, scalable systems, and impactful technology solutions.

üîç Past Experiences:
‚Üí Founded Aurient.io, a mentorship management platform designed to help talent managers organise effective mentorship programs.
‚Üí Organised JunctionX Asia, a tech hackathon uniting over 300 participants from 30 countries.
‚Üí Presented at FOSSASIA, leading a workshop on real-time web applications.

Love to connect! I look forward to learning and growing with like-minded professionals!

updates.postText:
Great joy to be working on this project with an incredible team!
It's really cool that we are able to work remotely together across different countries to create impact in other parts of the world.

Low En and I will be presenting our talk cum workshop on Introduction to Real time Web Applications tomorrow 20th March 7.30pm (SGT) at FOSSASIA Open Tech Summit 2021!

We have initiated to conduct this workshop to our peers in Singapore University of Technology and Design (SUTD) previously in January, and we are really happy to be invited by FOSSASIA to bring this to a wider international audience! (Here's our previous workshop contents: https://lnkd.in/g9sABmb)

For those who are interested, join us live at Lifelong Learning Institute (LLI) or online as we explore applications of WebSockets & WebRTC! üòä

Check us out here: https://lnkd.in/gp6ayDQ

#opensource #foss #fossasia

Just concluded my stint in Product Management with SAP
I am really thankful to be given the chance to be part of the SAP AI Business Services - Recommender Systems team despite Covid-19 creating uncertainties for everyone. 
 
In this period, I have worked alongside many highly experienced and talented colleagues from product managers to data scientists and engineers. Being able to witness everyone‚Äôs expertise and caliber has been incredibly inspiring to me.

Stepping into the field of product management and B2B enterprise systems is something new to me, but I find this experience really insightful and rewarding. Not only did I get the chance to deep dive into product management, I also managed to have a development role with the engineering team as well. This is truly one of most fulfilling professional stints I have had.

I would like to thank my mentors lai kp and Steven Fu as well as everyone in the Recommender Systems team Leonard Dinu Utsav Garg Calvin Soh Benjamin Tan Alaukik Pant lixian for the patience and guidance. I truly enjoyed the times and journey working with everyone!
 
For now, back to school and leveling up myself üòä

Hi all! JunctionX Asia is a virtual hackathon that will be held this Thursday evening till Sunday and registrations are still open! It is jointly organised by the junctionx teams from Singapore, Hanoi, Seoul and Chengdu to create a diverse hackathon for people from different cultures.
Open to everyone from Asia! Don't worry if you do not have a team, you can join and we will try to match you with others!

We have challenge statements from Microsoft, Kaspersky, Nokia and NCCA, and webinars from professionals from various fields, so it'll be a fun one!

Visit https://lnkd.in/gdcYTSc to take a look!

Just wrote an article on Progressive Web Apps (PWA). PWA is not something new but I thought this article would give a clearer idea of what PWAs are and why they may be overlooked & underrated. I think this article is friendly to both non-technical and technical readers, so feel free to have a read :)

Happy that Medium has selected and recommended this article to readers interested in Programming and Javascript topics, and this article is also published under The Startup, Medium's largest publication.

recommendations.name: Amit Jayee
recommendations.subtitle: Regional Head of Engineering for Backend, Platforms and Infrastructure | Executive Director at GXS Bank
recommendations.description:
I had the privilege of being managed by Amit as my Engineering Manager, and it was truly an enriching experience.

Throughout my time working with him, I was consistently impressed by Amit's remarkable abilities as an engineering manager and leader. He possesses a rare blend of technical expertise and people skills that makes him an exceptional leader. As a manager, he has a natural ability to inspire the team and foster an environment of collaboration to do meaningful work. He's super approachable, frank, and genuine in his interactions with each of us, and enabled us to thrive in a safe space where we are constantly improving. His adeptness at guiding the team towards success and navigating challenges with ease is very admirable. I appreciated how he trusted and empowered me to take on larger responsibilities, which helped me grow as an engineer.

What truly sets Amit apart is his deep understanding of engineering principles from high-level to low-level systems. His technical expertise and attention to detail are unmatched. He‚Äôs ability to guide the team in the right direction and collaborate with other engineers and managers is a true asset to any project. He‚Äôs expertise in software architecture and building highly scalable and reliable software systems in the payments space is truly impressive. He plays a pivotal role in many key decisions and projects in the team, where his technical expertise and guidance have proven invaluable and critical. It‚Äôs a pleasure to work with someone who is so dedicated to producing great products.

One of the things that really stands out about Amit is his relentless passion for building truly great products from both engineering and product perspectives. He consistently champions to build great products with a good user experience that is highly scalable at the same time. His ability to objectively assess and push for the right things is really inspiring and critical to the team's success.

I loved every moment of working with Amit! I highly recommend him as an Engineering Leader without any doubt. I‚Äôm confident he is able to do an outstanding job and create a huge impact at any organization!

experiences.title: Co-founder, Product Lead, iOS Engineer
experiences.jobDescription:
As a technical co-founder, I built and led a team of iOS and Android engineers in building a fully-featured MVP for Tickle, an experiences platform much like Airbnb's Experiences.

The startup is currently exploring the Indonesian market and has yet to achieve product market fit.

experiences.title: Product Manager, iOS Engineer
experiences.jobDescription:
As PM, I successfully managed a team of iOS, Android and Web engineers in building and launching Wander, a group messaging app. Having experience developing for iOS, I also wrote the code for the iOS platform.

Our goal for Wander was to build a messaging ecosystem where chat is more than just the usual text, photo, video and audio message types. As a service focused on groups, message types that we plan to add over time include polls, live chat, file sharing and collaborative features such as shared lists and map annotations, accessible to anyone who joins the channel.

experiences.title: Technical Director
experiences.jobDescription:
Worked with a talented team of VFX artists from all around the world to create the magic for films in the Harry Potter series, Christopher Nolan's Inception, The Dark Knight and Interstellar, for which the company won The Academy Award for Best Visual Effects.

As TD, my role covered not just the technical aspects (matchmoving, modeling, animation, physics simulation, rendering) of VFX production but also much of the creative aspects. For example, software water simulations, even if it's physically accurate, are usually enhanced for dramatic effect to tell the story imagined by the director.

experiences.title: Director Of Photography
experiences.jobDescription:
Working with many writers and directors from Singapore's local TV and Film industry, I planned and executed the technical and creative production of a film or TV series, which includes filming, lighting, editing and visual effects.

Clients include ChannelNewsAsia, National Geographic and Discovery Channel.

recommendationsReceived.name: Supheakmungkol Sarin, PhD
recommendationsReceived.subtitle: Co-founder, AI Safety Asia | Senior AI Consultant, World Bank | Former Head of Data & AI, WEF | Former Google AI Lead | Advised UN on national AI strategy | Board Advisor | NED
recommendationsReceived.context: Supheakmungkol managed Thura directly
recommendationsReceived.description:
I have worked closely with Thura on many Google projects for Myanmar over two years. Thura is one of the most dedicated, collaborative and creative professionals that I have had the pleasure of working with. Thura has been a stellar addition to our team, contributing a unique combination of skills in technical implementation, users‚Äô understanding and business strategy. 
 
During his time with Google, Thura has touched upon virtually all Google products for Myanmar from Virtual keyboard, Handwriting, Android in Burmese to Gmail and Android One. For many of these products, he is involved in everything from conception, design to the actual implementation and launch.  It's very rare to find someone who is excellent at understanding how to improve business and products but at the same time, go back to his desk and actually develop the solution.
 
Thura is one of the most creative and resourceful people I know. We have been lucky to benefit from his enthusiastic participation on our team. It was very difficult to see him leave the organization. I highly recommend Thura for any endeavor he pursues.

recommendationsReceived.name: Norbert Kleijn
recommendationsReceived.subtitle: Social Entrepreneurship üå±
recommendationsReceived.context: Norbert managed Thura directly
recommendationsReceived.description: Thura is a smart, ambitious and very hardworking professional. He joined our team to launch and optimize Google products for Myanmar, and being the first Googler on ground he serves as eyes, ears and voice of Google his home country. Thura has contributed a great deal to improve internet access in Myanmar during his first 12 months at the company, and I have no doubt that he will continue to be of great value to Google and his local community in the future. His extensive knowledge of IT and software development are a great asset for any company and I therefore highly recommend working with Thura.

recommendationsReceived.name: Allen Miu
recommendationsReceived.subtitle: Cofounder and CTO at Frontiir
recommendationsReceived.context: Allen managed Thura directly
recommendationsReceived.description:
Thura Hlaing is an impressive software engineer and one of the most productive contributor I've ever worked with.  His coding skill is both diverse and deep, able to apply the best practices and techniques to produce nice, simple, clean and effective solutions---all that plus documentation that come with screenshots and examples.  He does not code just to satisfy requirement but code to ensure flexibility and extensibility.  Thura Hlaing loves and enjoys what he does and it was a pleasure to work with him.

Thura Hlaing is looking to spread his wings and pursue his ambitions and dreams.  I sure hope his next manager/mentor can nurture his talent and help him unleash all his potentials to achieve great things.

He rarely complains about issues / challenges and always a team player, helping juniors and working effectively with cross-team. 

He is passionate about technology, writing articles and community contributions in his spare time, and can easily pick up and learn new technologies as needed. 

It was a pleasure to work with him and I would highly recommend him for any software development role or position.

headline: Group CTO at 99 Group
about:
With 12+ years of experience in software engineering, 8 of them in leadership. I‚Äôve led and scaled teams of 100+ engineers across multiple regions, driving impactful solutions at scale.

I excel at giving strategic direction to engineering teams, ensuring alignment with business goals while maintaining technical excellence. At the same time, I‚Äôm not one to shy away from getting hands-on when needed. I dive deep into the details to understand the root cause of problems and ensure we‚Äôre solving the right issues.

My passion lies in distributed systems and tackling system bottlenecks, always entrusted with solving my organization‚Äôs most challenging technical problems. I have a pragmatic mindset, constantly weighing trade-offs to find the most effective and scalable solutions.

As a bar raiser, I don‚Äôt just improve teams, I transform organizations. Whether it's optimizing processes, elevating engineering culture, or driving innovation, my track record and strong recommendations from past managers reflect my ability to deliver lasting impact.

I operate with a high sense of ownership. Once I commit to something, I go the extra mile to ensure it gets done.

experiences.title: Senior Engineering Manager
experiences.jobDescription:

- Rearchitect customer and loyalty service using CQRS architecture. Reduce the response time by 97%.

- progressively eliminated the payment discrepancy from 0.3%(before taking over) to 0% in 6 months.
- help revamp the hiring process, introduce 4 stages interview process, grow the team from 30 engineers to 80+ engineers.
- refactor our authorization service to reduce force logout event from 600k monthly to 0. Dubbed as the most significant impact engineering improvement.

technology: Spring Boot, Kafka, SQS, AWS Api Gateway, Elastic beanstalk, Redis, DocumentDB, DataDog, Sentry, CleverTap.

experiences.title: CTO (Co-Founder)
experiences.jobDescription:
Tapiver is a location-based shopping app for Singapore. Tap into any location in Singapore (‚ÄúHaji Lane‚Äù or any of your favourite location) and you will be able to shop at the retail stores on your smartphone.

As the tech founder of Tapiver, my responsibilities include:
- Liaise with Business and marketing team to translate business requirement to technology solutions.
- Designed, architected and developed Tapiver Backend using Play framework and integrated with Stripe, One Signal, Firebase, AWS S3, and Nexmo. The backend service is developed with scalability and clean code as the top priority. 
- Designed the database  structure for Tapiver, which has around 50 tables to accommodate different use cases.
- Work in the team of 2 to develop https://seller.tapiver.com using React with Redux.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.jobDescription:
-Acted as sole project executor, completed all tasks and managed project from start to finish for the following projects:
1. OnTalk Vault Web(similar to Google drive or dropbox) using React with redux within a very tight 6 weeks‚Äô timeline.
2. OnTalk Web POC(similar to whatsapp web chat) using angular JS

-work in the team of 2 to revamp OnTalk manager dashboard with the new flows, functionality and look and feel using Spring framework

experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.jobDescription:
-Designed and implemented an automatic failover software that monitors and maintains services availability, leading to 99.8 percent service uptime and 85 percent reduction in customer support calls. (Java, Amazon Web Service/AWS API)
-Developed a dashboard that allows the client to monitor real time service's latency and availability (ActiveMQ, Play Framework)
-Developed a RESTful API to mimic the functionality provided on our syndicate trading detection portal(Jersey)
-Fixed major issues in a data analyzer software for syndicate trading detection portal leading to 95 percent reduction in false negative result.
-Consistently able to finish  scraper/crawler for numerous trading sites to provide real time data in an agreed format within 80% of the given timeline. (Ruby and Java)
-Created a RESTful API to manage servers from various Cloud Services(Play Framework)
-implemented crash-resistant mysql master and master replication 
-automated deployment of services using Shell scripts

recommendationsReceived.name: Shandy Hidayat
recommendationsReceived.subtitle: Engineering
recommendationsReceived.context: Shandy managed Erwin directly
recommendationsReceived.description:
Erwin is one of the best engineering leaders I have worked with throughout my professional career. He has always been great at managing his team, and his team members always respect and look up to him. His exceptional technical leadership traits have always shone during critical and complex projects. He consistently displays strong critical thinking, open-mindedness, and a curiosity to learn new things, all hallmarks of a great engineering leader.

I will always recommend Erwin for any senior engineering leadership position. It has been a great honor to work with Erwin, and I believe he will continue to grow and deliver excellent results

recommendationsReceived.name: Razvan Voicu
recommendationsReceived.subtitle: Head of Technology at TAS Connect | Ex Facebook | Ex Bank of Am | Ex JP Morgan | Ex Bell Labs
recommendationsReceived.context: Razvan managed Erwin directly
recommendationsReceived.description:
Erwin is a truly exceptional engineering leader. His dedication is evident in his strong work ethic, and he's a firm believer in lifelong learning, as demonstrated by his pursuit of a Master of Technology degree while working. He‚Äôs technically skilled, but also self-aware, and he‚Äôs always looking for ways to improve, readily seeking advice and learning from others. He creates a culture of continuous improvement through his own actions.

Erwin's communication skills are outstanding. He explains complex technical ideas clearly and with empathy, ensuring everyone on the team is on the same page. His approachable, down-to-earth style makes him very popular with his team. He values open communication and builds trust, which leads to great collaboration. Importantly, he's a strong advocate for his team, always ensuring they're treated fairly and recognized for their hard work.

Erwin is highly focused on delivering results. He fosters a culture of personal responsibility, empowering his team to take ownership and drive projects to successful completion. His strategic vision and ability to motivate his team ensures consistent achievement of goals. Erwin's combination of technical expertise, empathetic leadership, and dedication to excellence makes him an outstanding engineering leader.

recommendationsReceived.name: Vincent Vincent
recommendationsReceived.subtitle: Engineering Manager
recommendationsReceived.context: Vincent reported directly to Erwin
recommendationsReceived.description:
Erwin was my manager and the Head of Engineering during the three years that we worked together. Erwin's technical engineering skills were exceptional, and his contributions to our organization were invaluable.

As my manager, Erwin was an excellent mentor who was always willing to provide guidance and support. His vast technical knowledge and expertise were evident in his ability to quickly analyze complex problems and provide effective solutions. Erwin was also a great listener who encouraged open communication and constructive feedback to help us achieve our goals.

during that time, Erwin and I worked together on migrating multiple legacy services to microservices architecture. Utilizing Spring Boot, Postgres, Kafka, Elasticsearch, and ClickHouse, we were able to effectively scale a considerable number of services to handle a high volume of transactions per second. Moreover, we successfully delivered these services with minimal issues on production using canary deployment.

Erwin's technical engineering skills and leadership abilities were crucial in driving our organization's success, and I have no doubt that he will continue to excel anywhere he goes. I highly recommend Erwin to anyone seeking a skilled and competent leader with exceptional technical engineering skills.

recommendationsReceived.name: Steven -
recommendationsReceived.subtitle: Software Engineer
recommendationsReceived.context: Steven reported directly to Erwin
recommendationsReceived.description: Erwin is an exceptional manager whom I've had the pleasure of working with. During my time at MOKA as a fresh graduate software engineer, he provided numerous opportunities for me to develop my skills. One particular example was when he entrusted me, along with two other team members, to refactor a monolithic Ruby on Rails application into microservices using Spring Boot, a technology that I had not previously worked with. During our one-on-one meetings, he provided valuable feedback and advice in a constructive manner. I highly recommend him if you're looking for the best team manager.

recommendationsReceived.name: Alvin L Wiradja
recommendationsReceived.subtitle: Scaling Products & Portfolios
recommendationsReceived.context: Alvin L worked with Erwin on the same team
recommendationsReceived.description: I worked with Erwin for more than 4 years to build Moka Pos, I witnessed how Erwin always developed both intellectually and leadership, from being responsible for leading a small team to finally becoming a big team with critical responsibilities to lead the entire Moka POS feature development. Erwin is an engineering leader who is not only strong managerially but is also willing to roll up his sleeves to go hands-on and directly help his team when needed. He also cares about business and customers and is able to translate that to his team. I'm sure Erwin deserves a more senior role and he can be relied on at all stages of your company.

recommendationsReceived.name: Harry M.
recommendationsReceived.subtitle: Engineering Lead | FinTech
recommendationsReceived.context: Harry worked with Erwin on the same team
recommendationsReceived.description:
As a seasoned leader in the field of engineering, I can confidently say that Erwin stands out as one of the most exceptional and talented individuals I have had the pleasure of working with. In his role as a Senior Engineering Manager, Erwin has displayed an unparalleled ability to balance product engineering expertise with effective team leadership.

Erwin's record of managing complex, high-impact projects that have had a lasting impact on the organization speaks for itself. His exceptional skillset and ability to drive results have been instrumental in the success of our team. He is a true visionary and constantly brings new ideas and approaches to the table, showcasing his technical creativity and adeptness in product development.

But what truly sets Erwin apart as a leader is his unwavering commitment to his team. He has a rare talent for building and motivating an effective team, creating a positive and inclusive work environment where everyone feels valued and supported. He shows genuine care for his team members, consistently going above and beyond to ensure their success. This, coupled with his technical acumen, has made Erwin a valuable asset to any organization.

I cannot recommend Erwin highly enough for any senior engineering management role. He is a trusted and respected leader who has earned the admiration of his colleagues and peers. In my experience, Erwin has been a true game-changer and has left an indelible mark on the organization. It has been an honor to work alongside him, and I have no doubt that he will continue to make a significant impact in his future endeavors.

recommendationsReceived.context: Poh Seng worked with Erwin on the same team
recommendationsReceived.description:
Erwin is a hardworking, very focused, and intelligent person that I admire. He is very dedicated to the tasks at hand and not hesitant to take lead in solving a problem when he is faced with one. He likes to deep dive into his work, whether it is new project or maintenance work.

When challenged with something new, Erwin is never hesitant to climb the steep learning curve. His persistence, fast learning skill, and consistency is excellent. I have worked with Erwin for about a year and this make me realize that I have much I can learn from him.

Erwin also gelled very well and blended in easily with his team. In summary, he can get things done, and would be an asset to any team.

recommendations.name: Razvan Voicu
recommendations.subtitle: Head of Technology at TAS Connect | Ex Facebook | Ex Bank of Am | Ex JP Morgan | Ex Bell Labs
recommendations.description:
I had the unique opportunity of reporting directly to Raz, and I can confidently say that he is one of the most impactful engineering leaders I‚Äôve ever had the chance to learn from. His deep expertise in distributed computing, fault tolerance, and scalability set a high technical standard for our team, and he always guided us in designing architectures that were not only robust but also future-proof.

Beyond his technical skills, Raz is an outstanding mentor. As a former educator, he has a rare level of patience when it comes to explaining complex concepts, and he never treats any question as too basic. He genuinely cares that his engineers understand the solutions they implement, and he constantly pushes us to grow‚Äîencouraging us to learn new technologies, refine our skills, and expand our problem-solving capabilities.

Raz is also an exceptional team builder. During the hiring process, he knows how to attract top engineering talent, making candidates excited about joining us rather than a competitor. Once on board, he creates an environment where collaboration and motivation thrive. He understands that engineers perform best when challenged, so he regularly introduces opportunities for innovation‚Äîwhether through new technologies, proof-of-concepts, or ambitious technical goals.

Personally, I learned a great deal from Raz‚Äînot just as an engineer, but also as a leader. His approach to mentorship, problem-solving, and team management has shaped the way I think about engineering leadership. That said, I‚Äôd like to think our learning went both ways. There were moments when I was able to offer a fresh perspective or share insights that Raz found valuable, which speaks to his open-mindedness and willingness to learn from anyone, regardless of title or experience level.

Working with Raz has been a career-defining experience. His combination of technical mastery, mentorship, and leadership makes him an invaluable asset to any engineering organization. Any team would be lucky to have him at the helm.

recommendations.name: Harry M.
recommendations.subtitle: Engineering Lead | FinTech
recommendations.context: Erwin worked with Harry on the same team
recommendations.description:
I had the privilege of working with Harry for several years and I am thrilled to recommend him for his exceptional skills in engineering management. Harry has a unique ability to get things done and know what matters to the company, reflecting his pragmatic, clever, and calm approach to his work.

his strategic thinking and problem-solving abilities have consistently resulted in innovative solutions to complex challenges. Harry's composed demeanor inspires confidence and allows him to make informed decisions, even under challenging circumstances. I have personally witnessed Harry lead his team with grace and poise, resulting in a motivated and productive group of engineers.

I cannot speak highly enough of Harry's work ethic and leadership style. He is a true asset to any organization, and I am confident that he would bring the same level of excellence to any company he works for.
